definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]

sentences.english: Young anthers are composed of a protoderm and a central cell mass in early July.
sentences.chinese: 七月上旬，幼花药，由原始表层和中央细胞团组成。

sentences.english: Cytological observation of cytoplasmic male- sterile anther of brown cotton.
sentences.chinese: 棕色棉细胞质雄性不育花药的细胞学观察。

sentences.english: The anthers of the mutant were fully or partially degenerated.
sentences.chinese: 颖花内的花药部分退化或完全退化。

sentences.english: The abortion of flower buds and the split of anther are not influenced by the relative high humidity.
sentences.chinese: 相对高湿对幼蕾败育和当日花药开裂没有影响。

sentences.english: Moreover, there were clear initial differences in tapetum between the two types of materials before anther culture.
sentences.chinese: 两种材料的花药刚离体时绒毡层就存在著明显的差异。

sentences.english: All of us love one anther.
sentences.chinese: 我们所有人都爱一花药。

sentences.english: Ningjing 35 was best effect of culture using anther.
sentences.chinese: 花药为外植体时宁粳35的培养效果较好。

sentences.english: There were chloroplasts in Hodeum vulgare anthers.
The development of the anther wall belonged to a dicotyledonous type.
sentences.chinese: 花药壁发育类型为双子叶型。

sentences.english: The blackish anthers are striking among the white raceme hairs.
sentences.chinese: 微黑的花药正在白色的总状花序毛中罢工。

sentences.english: Anthers will be tan colored and the white pollen falling from them will be obvious.
sentences.chinese: 花药将檀色和白色花粉掉下来，他们将非常明显。

sentences.english: Cytological observation of cytoplasmic male-sterile anther of brown cotton.
sentences.chinese: 棕色棉细胞质雄性不育花药的细胞学观察。

sentences.english: Antheral introversion or extroversion , slit or aperture leave.
sentences.chinese: 花药内向或外向，纵裂或孔开。

sentences.english: The anther is tetrasporangiate and glandular tapetum.
sentences.chinese: 雄蕊花药四室，腺质绒毡层。

sentences.english: The amount of pollen plants regeneration from a bud in the isolated microspore culture is higher slightly than that in pollen culture.
sentences.chinese: 而每花蕾成苗数则游离小孢子培养略高于花药培养。

sentences.english: The only difference of both anthers was that the tapetal cells of sterile anthers contained more vacuoles than those of fertile anthers.
sentences.chinese: 二者的差异仅是不育花药的绒毡层细胞液泡化明显。
